summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3404, for the improvement of Westlake Avenue North, from Valley Street to Newton Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42224 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
